settings.main_prah:
Our name Cocoxells is inspired by seashells’ strong exterior supporting the soft and sensitive life growing within. Metaphorically, modern females are often encouraged and expected to "toughen" up in society, together with busy lifestyle leads to the neglect of their sensitivities within.

Self love and care are topics receiving lots of attention globally, but we believe that self care should be applied to your body as a whole. While we are not strangers to products to care for our face, neck, hands and hair, our founders have not been able to find skincare options for our intimate areas, where our skin is even more sensitive and fragile.

settings.text: “ Cocoxell aspires to normalize our carefully researched and experimented intimate skincare product, encouraging every female to incorporate it into their everyday skincare routine - because you deserve it. ”
